description: Non-Supine RDI at 5% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 5% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrop5 + hnrop5 + carop5 + canop5 + oarop5 + oanop5 ) / ( remepop + nremepop )

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-Supine RDI at 5% oxygen desaturation
